author: jfarrell
msg: Thrift-1451:FramedTransport: Prevent infinite loop when writing
Invoked test client with a big enough query to trigger the resize

author: jfarrell
msg: Thrift-1454:Better handling of write on a closed TSocket
TSocket.send() was expecting a send() on the underlying socket
to fail by returning zero, but the actual behavior is to raise

author: todd
msg: HDFS-2627. Determine DN's view of which NN is active based on heartbeat responses. Contributed by Todd Lipcon.

author: hadrian
msg: Add bulletin processor as separate route. Minor jaxb improvements
